snippet: The new drug, Iclusig from Ariad Pharmaceuticals, has performed better in some patients than existing treatments for chronic myeloid leukemia.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves new drug, Iclusig from Ariad Pharmaceuticals, which has performed better in some patients than existing treatments for chronic myeloid leukemia.
lead_paragraph: The new drug, Iclusig from Ariad Pharmaceuticals, has performed better in some patients than existing treatments for chronic myeloid leukemia.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Gives Early Approval to Leukemia Drug Iclusig
headline.main: F.D.A. Gives Early Approval to Drug for Rare Leukemia
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Gives Early Approval To Drug for Rare Leukemia
